name: Vintage Leather Sofa
description: Add a touch of elegance to your living room with this vintage leather sofa. It features high-quality leather upholstery and sturdy wooden legs.

name: Modern Dining Table Set
description: Upgrade your dining room with this sleek and modern dining table set. It includes a table and four chairs, perfect for family gatherings and dinner parties.

name: Queen Size Canopy Bed
description: Create a luxurious bedroom retreat with this elegant queen size canopy bed. It features intricate metalwork and comes with curtains for added privacy.

name: Executive Office Desk
description: Boost your productivity with this stylish executive office desk. It features ample storage space and a sleek design that will complement any office decor.

name: Sectional Sofa Set
description: Transform your living room into a cozy and inviting space with this sectional sofa set. It features plush cushions and a modular design for versatility.

name: King Size Platform Bed
description: Sleep like royalty in this luxurious king size platform bed. It features a sturdy wood frame and a stylish upholstered headboard for added comfort.

name: Glass Top Dining Table
description: Entertain in style with this elegant glass top dining table. It features a contemporary design and a sturdy metal base for stability.

name: Cherry Wood Dresser
description: Organize your bedroom with this beautiful cherry wood dresser. It features spacious drawers and classic design details.

name: L-Shaped Computer Desk
description: Maximize your workspace with this practical L-shaped computer desk. It features a durable construction and plenty of surface area for all your tasks.

name: Reclining Sectional Sofa
description: Relax in style with this luxurious reclining sectional sofa. It features plush cushions and adjustable headrests for personalized comfort.
